test_i2c_sda.help: I2C SDA pin of the LSM303DLHC. It should be used for library tests only

test_i2c_scl.help: I2C SCL pin of the LSM303DLHC. It should be used for library tests only

test_int_1.help: INT1 pin of the LSM303DLHC. It should be used for library tests only

test_int_2.help: INT2 pin of the LSM303DLHC. It should be used for library tests only

test_drdy.help: DYDY pin of the LSM303DLHC (magnetometer). It should be used for library tests only
